title: Echoes on the Wind
description: The second novel in the bestselling Borrowed Time seriesItâ€™s been two years since Tom Jacob was thrust back through time to his old life, but the echoes of the past still linger, as does his determination to return.Desperate and downhearted, all seems lost, until a mysterious letter arrives on his doorstep and a glimmer of hope awakens in him. The new path that it sets him on will change both his future, and what he thinks he knows of his past, but his reckless determination could have devastating consequences for those he loves the most.Will he ever be able to get back to the life that he built for himself in the past? Can he ever truly have it all without someone getting hurt? And who keeps watching him through the window?Echoes on the Wind is the follow up to the best-selling debut novel, Borrowed Time, and the second book in the series.
author: Russell  Dean
